name: search_by_coordinates_point
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ev_charge_finder.
Tool description: Extremely Fast and Simple real-time searches for EV charging stations, anywhere in the world.
API description: Search for EV charging stations near specific geographic coordinates point.

lng.description: Longitude of the geographic coordinates point to search near by.

lat.description: Latitude of the geographic coordinates point to search near by.

query.description:
Return EV charging stations matching a specific query or keyword.

**e.g.** *`evgo`*
**e.g.** *`tesla`*
**e.g.** *`chargepoint`*

min_kw.description: Restrict the result to the availability for connectors with a specific minimal value of power in kilowatts (closed interval - with that value).

max_kw.description: Restrict the result to the availability for connectors with a specific maximal value of power in kilowatts (closed interval - with that value).

limit.description:
Maximum number of results to return.

**Allowed values:** *1-500*.
**Default:** *20*.

available.description: Filter to find EV charging stations with an available connector.

type.description:
Return EV charging stations with connectors of one or more types, specified as a comma (,) delimited list of connector types to match.

**e.g.** *`CHAdeMO`*
**e.g.** *`J1772,CCS`*
